description: This file defines the FavoritesScreen widget in a Flutter application, responsible for displaying the user's saved favorite baby names, including UI layout, interactions, and data consumption from providers.

classes.name: FavoritesScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays the list of favorite baby names with options to clear favorites and shows a custom header.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the FavoritesScreen, including layout, styling, and interactive components.

methods.name: _buildHeader
methods.description: Creates the header section of the screen with the title, subtitle, and a button to clear favorites.
